main event: A point of light smaller than a pinhead was observed in the sky, moving erratically for forty minutes before fading from sight.
interesting points: The observer reported the object changing colors and moving side to side,The object was not detected on radar,The sighting lasted for a duration of forty minutes,The observer was Major Robert F. Hansen from the 44th Fighter Bomber Wing,The conditions included haze up to 25,000 feet with thin stratus at 35,000 feet.
sighted object: point of light in the sky
witness description: Major Robert F. Hansen; Airman and Commanding Officer of the 44th Fighter Bomber Wing.
